review: Great product especially if you have prime or don't have a smart tv!

review: The stick is fine-  but Amazon Prime has a few surprises for you when watching previous season  shows (unlike NetFlix)-  after a few episodes or a series, they ask for continued viewing payment by resourcing you to Hulu Plus

review: Absolutely love it! I use it for my son's room and also take it to travel so we can watch prime shows and netflix anywhere.

review: Easy to install and use.  I am having a little bit of trouble using the closed caption.  I had a Roku, but I like Fire Stick much better.

review: This item works very well for me and is quite handy to have around.
